bug.question: I have six legs and like to buzz. I make something sweet for you to love. Who am I?

hints.text: 💛 I'm often yellow and black.
🍯 I live in a hive.
🐝 I collect nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I hop and jump with strong back legs. I'm often green and eat leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to live in grassy fields.
🎶 I make a chirping sound.
💚 Some people consider me lucky.

bug.question: I have bright spots and like to fly around. People say I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am often red with black spots.
🌱 I eat aphids on plants.
⚫ My spots warn predators I don't taste good.

bug.question: I build my home with little sticks and leaves, working together with all my friends. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I'm very small and strong.
🏠 I live in a colony underground.
💪 I can carry things much heavier than myself.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, munching on leaves, then I wrap myself up and change magically. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I have beautiful wings.
🐛 My transformation is called metamorphosis.
🌸 I drink nectar from flowers with a long straw.

bug.question: I am a long, wiggly creature that lives in the ground. Birds love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🪱 I help make the soil healthy.
🌧️ I often come out when it rains.
🚫 I don't have any legs.

bug.question: I twinkle at night, lighting up the dark. I have a light in my body. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I use my light to attract a mate.
🔦 I am also called a lightning bug.
🌃 I am most active during the summer.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My webs are often found in corners.
🕷️ I'm not an insect.
🪰 I eat flies and other small creatures.

bug.question: I look like a stick to hide from predators. I eat leaves and like to stay still. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 My camouflage helps me survive.
🌳 I am long and thin like a branch.
🚶 I move very slowly.

bug.question: I can walk on water. I hunt smaller insects in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 My weight is evenly distributed on the surface.
⛸️ I'm very quick and agile on the water.
🐜 I catch insects that fall into the water.

ocean.question: I wave to the shore, but I have no hands. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I'm made of water!
🌊 I move up and down.
🏖️ You can build sandcastles near me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I'm not a speedy animal.
🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🥬 I like to eat plants.

ocean.question: I am a very big fish with sharp teeth, some people are very scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦷I have rows and rows of pointy things
🎬 Movies are often made about me being scary
🐟 Other fish should be very careful around me!

ocean.question: I live in the sea and have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 8️⃣ Count my limbs!
🖤 I can squirt ink.
🪨 I like to hide in rocks.

ocean.question: I am very colourful, live in a coral reef, and like to hide amongst the anemones. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠I am a type of fish!
🏠 I live in a very special home.
🟠I have orange stripes.

ocean.question: I am a large mammal that lives in the ocean, I have a blowhole on top of my head. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am very big.
🗣️ I can sing songs.
💨 I breathe air.

ocean.question: I build my home using many tiny animals, creating a colourful underwater structure. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I provide shelter for other sea creatures.
🌈 I come in many colours.
🔨 I'm not built by humans.

ocean.question: I am a type of fish that is flat and swims along the ocean floor, sometimes camouflaged. What am I?

hints.text: 〰️ My body is not shaped like other fish!
👀 My eyes are both on the same side of my head.
🎨 I can blend in with the sand.

ocean.question: I am a long, thin fish that can deliver a very strong shock. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡️ Don't touch me!
🐍 I look like a snake, but I'm not.
🔦 I can stun my prey.

ocean.question: I am a very large creature with many tentacles, and I have the biggest eyes in the animal kingdom. What am I?

hints.text: 🦑 I am related to the octopus.
👁️ My eyes are the size of basketballs!
🌊 I live in the deep ocean.
